name: Pink Makeup
trend_description: The TikTok pink makeup trend embraces soft' girly aesthetics think rosy blushes, pastel pink eyeshadows, and matching lip tints or glosses that create an ethereal, monochromatic 'pink everything' look.

name: MBTI Makeup
trend_description: The MBTI makeup trend on TikTok encourages creators to match their makeup looks to their Myers-Briggs personality type like bold, structured 'INTJ power face' or soft, whimsical 'INFP glow' with many users sharing looks that embody the stereotypical vibe of their four-letter type. dexerto.com It's a playful, highly personalized spin on beauty that turns self-expression into a creative role' play of identity, even if often more aesthetic than psychologically grounded.

name: Caught Up Feels
trend_description: This trend is all about falling hard and fast for Navessa Allen's latest book, Caught Up. TikTok readers are spiraling in the best way as this swoon-worthy, slow-burn romance grabs hearts and refuses to let go. It's giving: tension so thick you can't breathe, glances that say everything, and the kind of emotional payoff that leaves you wrecked and healed at the same time. Readers are sharing tear-streaked selfies, annotated pages, and late-night ramblings because Caught Up isn't just a book it's a full-blown obsession. Warning: Side effects may include chest clenching, soft gasps, and an urgent need to talk about it with strangers online.

name: Domestic Diva Diaries
trend_description: In this unapologetically bold TikTok trend, stay-at-home moms are rewriting the narrative one chore at a time set to the high-energy beat of Latto's 'Blick Sum' sound. Think big lashes, bigger energy, and even bigger attitude as moms strut through their daily routines like it's New York Fashion Week. From power-walking with laundry baskets to serving gourmet toddler meals like five-star chefs, these queens of the household are showing that running a home is a full-time, boss-level job and they're doing it with style, swagger, and a soundtrack that slaps. It's not just mom content it's main character energy in mom mode.

name: Juicy Girl Summer
trend_description: This trend is all about romanticizing your coffee runs, journaling in vintage notebooks, and channeling your inner pop muse with a swipe of high-shine nostalgia. It's soft, it's sparkly, and it's unapologetically you. Because this summer? We gloss, we glow, we romanticize everything.

name: Carrot Salad Recipe
trend_description: Say hello to your new glow-up secret TikTok's viral carrot salad that's basically a vitamin C party for your skin and your taste buds. Packed with crunchy, fresh goodness, this salad isn't just delicious; it's a retinol's best friend, boosting your skincare routine from the inside out. Bright, zesty, and bursting with color, this recipe is the ultimate #SnackAndSlay move because glowing skin starts with what you eat. Crunch, munch, and watch your skin thank you. Who knew healthy could taste this viral?

name: The One Thing Glow Up
trend_description: A trend where creators reveal the one skincare product they wish they discovered sooner, showing off their glow-up.

name: The Book Just Clicked
trend_description: A trend where readers share the exact moment a book's plot suddenly makes sense paired with a dramatic audio to show their realization.

name: What I Eat In a Day
trend_description: The TikTok 'What I Eat in a Day' trend features creators filming and narrating their meals, often with calorie counts, throughout a single day, providing an intimate glimpse into their dietary routine. While these videos can inspire cooking ideas or meal prep, experts and viewers warn they often perpetuate diet culture, unrealistic comparisons, and may trigger disordered eating behaviors.

name: When you lied on your resume
trend_description: POV: You lied on your resume and now they actually want you to do it

name: Man of the Year
trend_description: Highlighting the walking red flags who had the audacity to disappoint you This trend uses the audio 'let's hear it from the man of the year' to call out the most unimpressive men in your life exes, almosts, or even that one coworker who thought he was the main character It's petty, it's personal, and it's painfully relatable.

name: NYX Smushy Matter Lip Balm
trend_description: Beauty TikTok can't stop talking about the Smushy Matte Lip Balm NYX's newest viral hit. With a soft-blur finish, buildable tint, and hydrating feel (thanks to mochi rice powder + ceramides), it's the perfect mix of balm and color. Each shade smells amazing, and the squishy sponge applicator makes it fun to apply no wonder it's blowing up as the go-to my-lips-but-better look.

name: Cleopatra Makeup Trend
trend_description: Bold. Regal. Unforgettable. The Cleopatra makeup trend is everywhere right now and it's all about channeling that ancient queen energy. Think dramatic winged liner, gold accents, sculpted cheekbones, and powerful, mesmerizing eyes. From modern glam twists to full-on historical recreations, creators are embracing the iconic Egyptian look to serve main character energy with every stroke.

name: Q-Tip Eyeshadow Hack
trend_description: TikTok's latest beauty obsession? Dotting eyeshadow with Q-tips for a soft, effortless blend. This trend is all about using Q-tips to place precise pigment dots across the lid then blending them out for a dreamy, gradient effect It's beginner-friendly, oddly satisfying, and surprisingly effective making it perfect for both glam girls and makeup minimalists.

name: Viral Berry Brew
trend_description: Say hello to the it-girl drink of the moment: the Blueberry Latte This viral concoction blends the cozy comfort of espresso with the sweet, fruity burst of blueberry syrup served iced, swirled, and totally aesthetic. It's giving caf-core meets summer freshness, and creators are loving the unexpected flavor combo and the dreamy purple hues.

name: Cottagecore Dream House
trend_description: Step into a storybook TikTok is falling in love with the Cottagecore Aesthetic House trend. Think vintage teacups, lace curtains, dried flowers, antique books, and warm wooden tones. It's all about creating a home that feels like a cozy escape to the countryside, even if you're in the city. This trend romanticizes slow living, nature-inspired decor, and that soft, quiet magic of home life where every corner is curated for comfort and charm.

name: Think Pink Kitchen
trend_description: Move over neutrals TikTok is going full Barbiecore in the kitchen. From blush-toned appliances to rose gold utensils and cotton-candy cabinets, the Pink Kitchen Trend is all about turning your cooking space into a dreamy, pastel paradise. It's cozy, playful, and totally aesthetic perfect for creators showing off their inner homemaker with a touch of glam.

name: Time of Your Life
trend_description: BookTok is buzzing Jessa Hastings is back and readers are spiraling (in the best way). The upcoming release of Time of Your Life, set in her beloved Magnolia Parks universe, has fans counting down the days, re-reading every heartbreak, and romanticizing the chaos all over again. This trend is all about aesthetic edits, emotional theories, and preparing to have your heart shattered beautifully once more. Whether you're Team Magnolia or just love messy, poetic love stories this book drop is the moment.

name: Amazon Cloud Couch
trend_description: TikTok's coziest home upgrade has officially entered the chat: the Amazon Cloud Couch Affordable, plush, and surprisingly luxe, this viral dupe is transforming living rooms everywhere one dreamy cushion at a time. This trend is all about showing off your space's before and after, with creators turning basic setups into soft, minimalist sanctuaries. Add a throw blanket, a neutral palette, and boom you've got that high-end, laid-back lounge vibe without the $$$.

name: Not So Princess Nails
trend_description: POV: You've been rocking the grunge, the chaos, the feral girl nails then suddenly, princess-core nails are trending soft pinks, glazed tips, bows, and pearls and you're out here looking like you clawed your way out of a dungeon This trend is all about showing off your unapologetically unprincessed nails in contrast to the dainty aesthetic that's suddenly everywhere. It's ironic, self-aware, and hilariously relatable.

name: Huda Beauty Lip Contour Stain
trend_description: Say hello to lip game perfection TikTok is obsessed with the new Huda Beauty Lip Contour Stain, and for good reason. This viral product glides on like a dream, dries down to a natural-looking tint, and actually stays put through coffee, kisses, and chaos Creators are loving the soft, blurred lip look that lasts all day, giving effortless definition without the harsh lines. Whether you're going for a 'clean girl' flush or a full-on overlined pout, this stain is making lips the main character.

name: Green Goddess Salad
trend_description: FoodTok is in its leafy queen era say hello to the viral Green Goddess Salad This vibrant, crunchy mix of cabbage, cucumbers, scallions, and a creamy herby dressing is taking over feeds and plates everywhere. Whether you're scooping it with chips, wrapping it in lettuce, or just eating it straight from the bowl, this salad is the ultimate mix of healthy, satisfying, and aesthetic. It's giving clean girl lunch meets snack board energy and we're all here for it.

name: Hot Honey Hype
trend_description: These sweet-and-spicy sliders are taking over FoodTok with their irresistible mix of crispy chicken, buttery buns, and a sticky drizzle of hot honey. Easy to make and perfect for parties or cravings, this viral recipe is serving serious flavor and serious views.

name: Cool Cucumber Craze
trend_description: TikTok's latest green obsession is crunchy, zesty, and dressed to impress. This cucumber salad is the ultimate glow-up for your veggies tossed with vinegar, spices, and sometimes chili oil, it's giving fresh, fit, and flavor all in one bowl.

name: Mash to Munch
trend_description: From soft to crispy, TikTok has flipped the script on comfort food. Mashed potatoes are getting a second act as golden, crunchy fries.

name: Famous Whispers
trend_description: Your favorite stars are ditching the spotlight for soft-spoken vibes. Whether they're whispering secrets, tapping on perfume bottles, or crunching snacks, celebrities doing ASMR is the unexpected trend giving fans a whole new way to connect up close, personal, and oddly satisfying.

name: Main Character on the Metro
trend_description: Subway rides just got cinematic. This trend captures creators standing still while the train moves hair tousled, coat swaying, eyes lost in thought all set to the moody, electric beat of 'Buzzcut Season' by Lorde It's giving indie film energy, quiet rebellion, and 'don't talk to me, I'm in a music video' vibes. Simple shot, powerful mood. The motion blur of the train, the stillness of the subject it's all about becoming the main character in transit.

name: Fashion
trend_description: TikTok fashion trends are all about bold self-expression think oversized and micro, dramatic layering, and quirky accessories that make a statement in a 15-second scroll. Summer 25 - initially a blend of Y2K nostalgia, thrifted aesthetics, and cutting-edge micro-trends keeps the looks fresh and hyper-curated for maximum visual impact.

name: Mini Shorts Comeback
trend_description: Legs out, confidence up mini shorts are back, and TikTok is strutting into summer with major throwback energy. From Y2K denim cut-offs to sleek, tailored minis, creators are embracing the bold, leggy look with unapologetic flair. This trend is all about reviving that early 2000s edge paired with chunky sneakers, baby tees, and oversized sunnies. Whether you're channeling model-off-duty or full Bratz doll fantasy, mini shorts are the statement piece of the season.

name: Bandage Dress Renaissance
trend_description: The bodycon icon is back bandage dresses are making a fierce return on TikTok, and it's giving 2010s glam meets modern confidence. Once a red carpet staple, these curve-hugging dresses are being reimagined with fresh styling, luxe textures, and unapologetic attitude. Creators are reviving the look with strappy heels, slicked-back hair, and that 'I'm the moment' energy. Whether it's girls' night out or glam-core content, the Bandage Dress Renaissance is all about bold silhouettes, confident curves, and main character energy.

name: Return of the Indie Sleaze
trend_description: Grainy flash photos, smudged eyeliner, American Apparel, and chaotic nightlife energy TikTok is officially bringing back the Indie Sleaze era. Think 2010 Tumblr meets underground concert vibes, where messy is cool, and fashion doesn't try too hard (but totally does). This trend is all about low-rise denim, vintage band tees, leather jackets, and that effortlessly unbothered attitude. Paired with gritty filters and retro party clips, creators are reviving the era of late-night Polaroids and It-Girl chaos and loving every second of it.

name: Coquette Core
trend_description: Lace, ribbons, blush tones, and a touch of flirtation TikTok is deep in its Coquette era, and everything is soft, sweet, and a little bit mischievous. This aesthetic romanticizes hyper-femininity with vintage silhouettes, ballet flats, pearls, and bows galore. The trend isn't just about how you dress it's a whole mood: delicate handwriting, lipstick-stained teacups, and daydreaming like you're the heroine of a 2000s Lana Del Rey music video. Whether you're twirling in ruffles or pouting behind heart-shaped glasses, Coquette Core is all about embracing softness as strength.

name: Scrunchie Season
trend_description: Say goodbye to minimal and hello to maxi volume big scrunchies are the must-have summer accessory taking over TikTok. Fluffy, bold, and unapologetically fun, these oversized hairpieces are turning everyday ponytails into full-on main character moments. From breezy beach days to soft coquette looks, creators are styling these statement scrunchies in every color, fabric, and vibe. It's retro, it's playful, and it's the easiest way to upgrade your summer hair game.

name: Silent Agreement
trend_description: In this trending POV format, creators reach out to shake someone's hand but it's not just a greeting. It's a wordless *contract*, sealed with a grip and a line of text that reveals the shared (and often hilariously specific or chaotic) agreement between them and the viewer. Whether it's a mutual decision to romanticize red flags, skip the gym again, or swear off texting first, the handshake becomes a visual punchline to a relatable pact. This trend plays on the simplicity of human connection and the humor in unspoken, universal deals all from the first-person view. Perfect for comedy, satire, or soft emotional twists, this trend turns a simple gesture into a viral language of mutual understanding.

name: Summer Morning Diaries
trend_description: Slow pours, sunlit sheets, and soft playlists TikTok is embracing the calm with Summer Morning Diaries, a lifestyle trend capturing the beauty of intentional, peaceful starts to the day. From skincare rituals and matcha moments to journaling on the balcony, creators are turning their morning routines into cinematic mini-vlogs. It's not just content it's a vibe. These cozy, aesthetic clips are all about romanticizing the small things and reclaiming the slow, golden hours of summer.

name: A Million Different People
trend_description: This cozy and aesthetic BookTok trend invites viewers into the timeline of someone's reading life one book at a time. Whether it's a rom-com binge, fantasy spiral, or emotionally devastating reads back to back, this trend beautifully captures the phases of a reader's journey. It's not just about showing what you've read it's about visually telling the story of your stories. A perfect blend of aesthetic vibes, literary love, and satisfying transitions, this trend feels like flipping through the chapters of your soul in hardcover form. Great for showcasing reading progress, themed reads, or even personal "book eras."

name: Glow Girl Summer
trend_description: This trend is all about catching the sun and keeping it on your face. The Glowy Summer Makeup trend has creators leaning into dewy skin, warm tones, glossy lips, and highlighter that looks like it's been bottled straight from golden hour. Think radiant cheekbones, sunkissed freckles, and that effortless, just-stepped-off-the-beach glow. Set to dreamy music or summer anthems, these videos aren't just tutorials they're soft flexes of luminous beauty and carefree energy. It's less about contour and more about capturing light. Whether you're bronzed or bare-faced with just a touch of shimmer, this trend celebrates the art of looking like you're glowing from within with a little help from your makeup bag. Perfect for GRWM, no-foundation looks, or showcasing your favorite summer beauty products.

name: Summer Berry Refresher
trend_description: Say hello to summer's new main character: the Starbucks Summer Berry Refresher and it's taking over your FYP like a splash of fruity serotonin. With vibrant pink and purple hues, floating berries, and that iconic green straw, this drink has quickly become the aesthetic accessory of the season. In this trend, creators sip, review, or romantically film their first taste, often set to dreamy summer sounds and drenched in sunlight. Whether it's a drive-thru vlog, a taste test with besties, or a hot girl walk with Starbies in hand, the Summer Berry Refresher isn't just a drink it's a vibe, a mood, a moment. Refreshing, photogenic, and totally TikTok-core, this trend blends the flavors of berry bliss with that undeniable Starbies culture.

name: The Scarf Comeback
trend_description: The scarf is back and it's more than just neckwear. This trend marks the stylish return of a timeless accessory that TikTok has officially rebranded as the ultimate fashion chameleon. From headwraps and hair ties to tops, belts, and bag accents, creators are breathing new life into the silk square with endless styling hacks. It's part vintage, part Y2K, and all about versatility. Whether tied like an old-money headscarf on a boat, folded into a halter top for a summer night out, or knotted around a tote for that effortless chic vibe, scarves are stealing the spotlight.

name: Tomato Flight
trend_description: The 'Tomato Flight' trend is TikTok's juiciest summer food craze creators slice up colorful heirloom tomatoes and top each one with unique combos (like mozzarella & basil, goat cheese & honey, or cream cheese & everything bagel seasoning). Each slice gets a taste test, and the reactions are part of the fun. Think charcuterie board, but all tomato. #tomatoflight

name: Time-Stamped Diaries
trend_description: Welcome to the most satisfying peek into someone else's routine one timestamp at a time. This trend captures creators documenting their daily lives in bite-sized moments, each marked with a specific time. From "7:03 AM - Coffee & quiet" to "9:47 PM - Skincare & soft music," viewers are taken on a real-time journey through everything from mundane tasks to golden-hour magic. Whether it's a productive day-in-the-life, a cozy reset routine, or a chaotic slice of life, the timestamp format adds structure, intimacy, and a cinematic touch to everyday storytelling. It's the perfect blend of aesthetic vibes and relatability showing that even the smallest moments matter when strung together hour by hour.

name: I Wonder What's Inside
trend_description: This trend turns small business pride into a scroll-stopping showcase. It starts with the simple, intriguing line: "I wonder what's inside" and suddenly, viewers are taken on a mini virtual tour through curated slideshows of products, shelves, packaging, and the shop's unique vibe. Whether it's a cozy caf, a handmade jewelry brand, a boutique clothing rack, or a scent-filled candle store, creators are giving followers a front-row look at the heart of their hustle. It's part marketing, part storytelling and all about aesthetic, ambition, and that personal touch.

name: Cherry Makeup
trend_description: Soft, flushed, and just the right amount of juicy the Cherry Makeup trend is the latest beauty obsession taking over TikTok. Think rosy red cheeks, glossy cherry-toned lips, and a youthful glow that feels straight out of a romantic daydream. Inspired by the ripe richness of cherries, this look is playful, feminine, and effortlessly flirty. Creators are layering pink-red blush across cheeks and nose bridges, adding glistening highlights, and finishing with a pop of shiny red or berry lip gloss. The result? A look that's equal parts fresh-faced and siren-coded like you've just taken a bite of summer.

name: Mid-Year Reading Check
trend_description: It's the halfway mark of the year, and BookTok is clocking in with their Mid-Year Reading Check. In this trend, creators share a visual recap of the books they've read from January to June stacking them, rating them, or flipping through covers like chapters in their own story. Whether it's a humble five-book streak or a 50-book flex, this trend is all about celebrating the reading journey so far. Some highlight their favorites (or biggest flops), others track their progress toward yearly reading goals, and many simply use it to romanticize the act of finishing anything.

name: Smash Burger Tacos
trend_description: TikTok's latest food obsession is the Smash Burger Taco a drool-worthy fusion that brings together the crispy goodness of a smashed beef patty and the handheld magic of a tortilla. This viral recipe has creators pressing seasoned ground beef directly onto tortillas, searing them to perfection, then stacking them high with melty cheese, pickles, onions, and that signature burger sauce. It's the perfect blend of fast food flavor and street taco style crunchy, juicy, cheesy, and totally customizable. The trend is blowing up for its simplicity, satisfying sizzle, and mouthwatering results that make viewers say, 'Okay, I need to try that now.'

name: Neapolitan Hair
trend_description: The Neapolitan Hair trend is serving scoops of style literally. Inspired by the classic trio of strawberry, vanilla, and chocolate, this bold and playful hair trend has taken over TikTok with its deliciously distinct color-blocking: soft pink, creamy blonde, and rich brunette shades blended in creative harmony. Whether done in vertical panels, horizontal layers, or peekaboo sections, Neapolitan Hair is all about sweet contrast and unapologetic color expression. It's a bold nod to early 2000s experimental styles with a modern, pastel-core twist perfect for creators who want to turn heads and serve a look with flavor.

name: Life, But Narrated
trend_description: In this trending TikTok format, creators are turning their everyday lives into cinematic stories with the help of a narrator voiceover. Whether it's a humorous take, a soft reflection, or a dramatic twist, the narrator sound walks viewers through the creator's life adding a storytelling layer that makes even the smallest moments feel like part of a bigger plot.

name: There Was Once A Time
trend_description: This emotional and reflective trend invites creators to share their personal glow-ups, transformations, or untold backstories with the powerful contrast of 'This is who I am now but there was once a time'. Set to nostalgic or dramatic audio, the video often starts with a confident or peaceful clip of the current version of themselves, followed by flashbacks or emotional reveals from a very different chapter. Whether it's a mental health journey, a career switch, a style evolution, or a story of survival and growth, this trend captures the powerful arc of change. It's a moving blend of vulnerability and pride a reminder that behind every strong, thriving person is a version of them that once struggled, hoped, or dreamed of better. It's TikTok's way of saying: transformation is real, and every journey deserves to be seen.

name: Blush Butter Balms
trend_description: The beauty world is buzzing and TikTok can't stop talking about the Summer Fridays Blush Butter Balms. Set to dreamy audio and soft aesthetics, this trend captures the excitement and countdown energy of a much-anticipated drop. Think swatches, packaging peeks, and 'add to cart' declarations, all wrapped in a buttery, blush-toned vibe.

name: It's Not Clocking To You
trend_description: This trend captures the frustration of trying to explain that one thing the thing that feels so obvious, so important, so deeply you to someone who just doesn't get it. With a dramatic or emotionally-charged audio playing in the background, creators go off in a half-sarcastic, half-serious rant, venting their confusion, passion, or disbelief that the other person still doesn't understand. Whether it's about a niche obsession, a misunderstood feeling, or something hilariously specific ('how do you not see the vision?!'), this trend turns everyday exasperation into relatable, performative storytelling. It's raw, expressive, often funny and a safe space to finally say: 'This makes sense in my head, okay?

name: Fisherman Core Fashion
trend_description: Rugged meets effortlessly cool welcome to Fisherman Core, the fashion trend that's casting major style waves on TikTok. Inspired by coastal living, practical layering, and utility details, this look blends function with fashion: think bucket hats, cargo vests, windbreakers, oversized knits, waterproof gear, and lots of earth-toned textures.

name: Shield of Sparrows
trend_description: BookTok is in full obsession mode over the new literary phenomenon: Shield of Sparrows. This trend showcases creators clutching the book, reacting to jaw-dropping plot twists, crying over chapters, or giving spoiler-free rants that leave you desperate to read it. Whether it's the slow-burn romance, political intrigue, or fantasy worldbuilding one thing is clear: this story hits. With haunting quotes, annotated pages, aesthetic edits, and emotional reactions, readers are making it known Shield of Sparrows isn't just a book, it's an experience. Whether you've finished it or you're just about to crack open page one, this trend is your official welcome to the chaos, feels, and fandom of the year's most talked-about read.

name: Watermelon Matcha
trend_description: TikTok has officially crowned Watermelon Matcha as the drink of the season and this trend is all about the juicy green-and-pink perfection that's taking over everyone's FYP. A refreshing twist on a classic favorite, this viral combo blends sweet watermelon juice with earthy matcha for a layered drink that's as aesthetic as it is delicious.

name: Emoji Identity
trend_description: This trend is the ultimate form of self-expression no words, just vibes (and emojis). TikTokers are posting photos of themselves paired with a curated lineup of emojis that perfectly capture their energy, personality, and aesthetic. Whether it's for the soft girl reader or for the alt introvert, each combo tells a mini story of who you are in emoji form.

name: I Could Never Be a Man
trend_description: This trend is a celebration of the everyday magic, softness, strength, and subtle luxuries of womanhood. Set to calm, romantic, or aesthetic audio, creators post short lifestyle clips making matcha, lighting candles, journaling in sunlight, or walking through farmer's markets overlaid with the bold yet playful statement: 'I could never be a man.' It's not about comparison it's about embracing the full spectrum of feminine energy, from glam to grounded, from chaotic to calm. Whether it's the joy of putting on lip gloss, romanticizing a solo grocery run, or simply being emotionally in tune, this trend is a love letter to the details of living life as her.

name: One Golden Summer
trend_description: BookTok is falling headfirst into the warm, wistful world of One Golden Summer by Carley Fortune, and this trend is the literary equivalent of a sunset that lingers a little too long. Set against soft music and sunlit visuals, creators are posting aesthetic videos of beach days, annotated pages, and teary-eyed reactions as they share how this book made them feel everything all at once.

name: Watermelon Sandwich
trend_description: TikTok has done it again introducing the unexpectedly viral (and surprisingly refreshing) Watermelon Sandwich. This trend is all about creators trying out or reacting to this sweet-meets-savory recipe that's taking FYPs by storm. Whether it's paired with cream cheese, feta, mint, or even hot honey, the watermelon sandwich is sparking curiosity, confusion, and a whole lot of 'wait this actually slaps?"

name: What my skin ate for breakfast
trend_description: This trend is serving glow goals with a side of aesthetic satisfaction. Creators are showcasing their morning skincare routines under the playful caption: 'What my skin ate for breakfast' turning serums, creams, and SPF into a visually delicious lineup of beauty bites. Each clip is a soft, satisfying montage of product textures, glowy application shots, and perfectly styled vanity setups. From hydrating toners to vitamin C serums and barrier-repair moisturizers, it's a full skincare feast that gives your skin the nourishment it craves and your FYP the calm it needs.

name: Layered Tank Tops
trend_description: Y2K is still winning and the latest fashion flashback taking over TikTok is the layered tank top trend. Creators are bringing back the iconic early 2000s look of stacking tanks on tanks, mixing colors, lengths, and textures to recreate the effortlessly cool, slightly chaotic energy of teen movie wardrobes and Disney Channel red carpets.

name: Running Out of Time
trend_description: With SZA's 'We're Running Out of Time' as the hauntingly beautiful lyric, this trend is all about embracing life's fleeting moments and making the most of the now. Creators use this trend to share intimate clips from golden hour walks to solo adventures, spontaneous laughter, or quiet, reflective mornings reminding viewers to stop waiting and start living. Whether it's chasing your dreams, prioritizing peace, or simply romanticizing the ordinary, this trend blends raw vulnerability with soft aesthetics. It's a digital journal of urgency and gratitude, wrapped in a dreamy, time-sensitive filter.

name: Dame Un GRR Glam
trend_description: This trend is pure attitude in motion. Set to the bold, high-energy track ""Dame Un GRR,"" creators are using the beat drop as the perfect cue for dramatic makeup transitions starting bare-faced or casual, then snapping into full glam with fierce confidence and flawless looks. It's all about transformation, precision, and timing. Whether it's glittery eyes, bold lips, or full contour slay, the sudden shift from soft to powerful perfectly matches the energy of the track. Each 'GRR' is a statement: you're not just showing off makeup you're unleashing a whole new vibe.

name: Sunrise on the Reaping
trend_description: BookTok and film fans alike are buzzing as Sunrise on the Reaping, the next chapter in the Hunger Games universe, steps into the spotlight and the excitement only exploded with the casting reveal. This trend captures that electric moment when long-time fans relive their Panem obsession, post reactions to the casting news, and romanticize the upcoming chaos with edits, quotes, and theories.

name: Boho is Back
trend_description: The Boho Aesthetic is making a dreamy, free-spirited comeback on TikTok, and this trend is all about soft silhouettes, earthy tones, and effortlessly layered textures. Creators are curating looks that blend vintage romance with a modern twist think flowy maxi skirts, crochet tops, fringe bags, floppy hats, and barefoot energy (bonus points for sun-drenched backdrops and acoustic soundtracks). More than just a style, boho is a vibe relaxed, soulful, and rooted in wanderlust. Whether it's styled for summer markets, music festivals, or slow-living mornings, this trend is bringing back that carefree spirit with a side of curated chic.

name: Chipotle Chicken Tacos
trend_description: TikTok's taste buds are officially locked in on the flavor-packed, mouthwatering Chipotle Chicken Tacos and this trend is serving spice, crunch, and crave-worthy content. With smoky chipotle-marinated chicken, crispy tortillas, melty cheese, and zesty toppings, creators are showing off their sizzling creations with step-by-step clips and satisfying bite shots that make viewers instantly hungry.

name: Ballerina Capuccina
trend_description: TikTok has entered its AI fever dream era, and the result? Hilariously surreal, beautifully bizarre AI-generated memes all set to the delicate, dramatic notes of 'Ballerina Capuccina.' This trend pairs over-the-top, oddly specific captions with uncanny AI visuals, creating a contrast between poetic elegance and meme-worthy absurdity.

name: Happy Birthday Grimace
trend_description: Just when we thought TikTok had moved on, the chaotic, oddly emotional, and absolutely iconic 'Happy Birthday Grimace' trend is making a glorious return and it's weirder, wilder, and more purple than ever. What started as a quirky celebration of McDonald's beloved purple mascot last year has become a cult favorite comeback, with creators once again toasting Grimace's birthday in hilariously dramatic, surreal, and sometimes dark videos.

name: Big Mac One Minute Challenge
trend_description: McDonald's fans and food lovers, brace yourselves the Big Mac Challenge is taking over TikTok, and the rules are simple but savage: eat one Big Mac in just 60 seconds. It's fast food meets fastest hands, with creators getting tagged, nominated, and hyped up to conquer the towering layers of the iconic burger all while racing against the clock. From intense countdowns to hilarious fails and unexpected wins, this challenge blends high-stakes munching with pure entertainment. Whether they're confidently prepping or instantly regretting, participants make it a full-on event complete with messy bites, speed-eating strategy, and the sweet taste of digital glory. One burger. One minute. Zero chill. Are you up for the Mac Attack?

name: Gabriela-inspired Makeup
trend_description: Bold, beautiful, and blooming with power the Gabriela-inspired makeup look by Katseye is taking over TikTok as creators recreate this fierce and feminine glam. Inspired by the strength, softness, and spirit of the iconic Filipina figure Gabriela Silang, this trend blends fierce eyeliner, flushed cheeks, and soft rosy tones to channel a modern-day warrior with a romantic edge.

name: Complicated Dance Vibes
trend_description: The early 2000s are alive and kicking on TikTok, thanks to the viral dance trend to Avril Lavigne's 'Complicated.' With a touch of sass, a bit of throwback angst, and some effortlessly cool moves, creators are serving Y2K energy while dancing to the pop-punk anthem that raised a generation.

name: Sounds like Love
trend_description: TikTok readers are swooning (and sobbing) over the emotional whirlwind that is Sounds Like Love, the book that's quietly stealing hearts and hitting deep. This trend is filled with soft visuals, annotated pages, and tear-streaked reactions as creators share how this story perfectly captures the ache of letting go, finding yourself, and learning to love again slowly, and on your own terms.

name: More is More
trend_description: Subtle? Never heard of her. TikTok is going all out with the Maximalism Fashion trend a bold, fearless celebration of color, texture, and too much of everything (in the best way). Creators are showing off outfits that clash on purpose, layer like art, and turn sidewalks into runways. Think statement prints, chunky accessories, glitter, feathers, frills all in one fit.

name: Protein S'mores
trend_description: TikTok has found the ultimate way to treat yourself and hit your macros say hello to the Protein S'mores trend. This viral recipe remix takes the nostalgic campfire classic and gives it a high-protein glow-up, combining gooey marshmallows, rich chocolate, and protein-packed ingredients that are equal parts indulgent and gym-approved.

name: The Wedding People
trend_description: BookTok is officially obsessed with The Wedding People, the novel that mixes mystery, drama, and emotional depth all set against the glitzy backdrop of a luxurious seaside wedding. This trend features creators sharing their gasps, favorite quotes, and post-read spirals as they dive into a story that's anything but predictable.

name: Boat Shoe Summer
trend_description: Just when you thought they were retired to yacht clubs and coastal closets forever boat shoes are making a stylish comeback, and TikTok is sailing full speed into the trend. Perfectly timed for summer, creators are styling these once-preppy staples in fresh, modern ways: with breezy linen pants, flowy skirts, oversized button-downs, and that effortless 'just stepped off a sailboat' energy. From vintage Ralph Lauren vibes to coastal granddaughter aesthetics, Boat Shoe Summer is a revival of comfort, class, and carefree charm. Whether you're actually on the water or just dressing like it, these shoes are your passport to a laid-back yet polished summer look.

name: Wendy's Fuego Meal
trend_description: TikTok's taste buds are on fire literally thanks to the new Fuego Meal from Wendy's, and creators are diving in with spicy reviews, dramatic first bites, and fiery reactions. This trend is all about testing heat tolerance, rating the crunch-to-spice ratio, and showing off just how bold Wendy's is going with this blazing new menu drop. From sizzling sandwich stacks to zesty sides and sauces, the Fuego Meal isn't just food it's a full-on flavor experience. Whether it's a 'can I handle this?' challenge or a 'new fave unlocked' moment, TikTokers are making it clear: Fuego isn't just a name it's a whole vibe.

name: Underconsumption Core
trend_description: In a sea of hauls, impulse buys, and endless product recs, TikTok is embracing a quieter, more intentional wave: Underconsumption Core. This trend is all about buying less, using what you have, and rejecting the pressure to always be chasing the next aesthetic. Creators are showing off capsule wardrobes, rewearing outfits, rotating skincare routines, and proudly saying: 'I didn't buy anything this month.' It's not anti-style it's pro-simplicity. A soft rebellion against overconsumption, this trend values quality, thoughtfulness, and sustainability over constant newness. Think minimal visuals, mindful reflections, and the quiet joy of appreciating enough.

name: Bare minimum or Princess treatment
trend_description: In this hilarious and revealing TikTok trend, girlfriends list out everyday relationship gestures like opening the car door, sending good morning texts, or remembering the coffee order while their boyfriends respond with either: 'bare minimum' or 'princess treatment.' The fun lies in the debate: is it just basic respect, or over-the-top romance? As couples go back and forth, viewers get a peek into their relationship dynamics, love language expectations, and what modern ""effort"" really looks like. Some answers spark agreement, others spark entire comment-section arguments but it's all part of the charm.

name: Makeup Project Pan
trend_description: In a world of endless hauls and new releases, TikTok's beauty community is shifting the spotlight to something refreshingly real the Project Pan trend. Creators are proudly showing off their well-loved, nearly empty products, tracking their progress, and celebrating every visible pan like it's a personal victory. From bronzers with a shiny silver center to lipsticks worn down to the base, this trend is all about intentional beauty using what you have, loving your collection, and getting the most out of every swipe. With monthly check-ins, mini reviews, and satisfying before-and-afters, it's a dopamine hit for makeup lovers who crave both glam and goals.

name: July TBR
trend_description: As July rolls in, BookTok is lighting up with cozy chaos and reading ambition through the July TBR (To Be Read) Trend. Creators are stacking their books both literally and virtually and sharing the stories they hope to devour this month, from swoony romances to dark academia thrillers. This trend captures the excitement of setting fresh reading goals, romanticizing your next read, and maybe (just maybe) finishing that book that's been sitting on your nightstand since April. Expect aesthetic stacks, annotated bookmarks, dramatic 'if I don't read this in July, scream at me' captions, and tons of peer pressure in the best way.

name: McDonalds Big Arch
trend_description: McDonald's just dropped its newest menu star the Big Arch and TikTok is biting all the way in. This trend is all about creators giving their first impressions, taste tests, and over-the-top reactions to the latest limited-edition burger. With its bold build, stacked layers, and golden name to match, the Big Arch is being hyped as the next iconic addition to the fast food hall of fame. From drive-thru hauls and unboxings to dramatic ""first bite"" slow-mo edits, the Big Arch isn't just a meal it's a moment. TikTokers are rating everything from the sauce game to the crunch factor, with hot takes, foodie breakdowns, and of course, some arch-level hype.

name: Set for the Summer
trend_description: TikTok fashion is having a major coordination moment, and the spotlight is on none other than matching sets. From linen co-ords and sporty two-pieces to cozy loungewear duos and bold patterned pairs, creators are embracing the ease, style, and instant polish that comes with a perfectly paired outfit. This trend is all about looking effortlessly put-together without the mental math of outfit planning. Matching sets are dominating the FYP styled up with heels and accessories or down with sneakers and messy buns proving that fashion's secret weapon might just be simplicity.

name: Amazon Zero Regret Purchases
trend_description: In a sea of impulse buys and late-night scrolling, this home & lifestyle trend is all about celebrating the Amazon purchases that were actually worth it. Creators are sharing the items that genuinely improved their daily routines from aesthetic home organizers and space-saving tools to viral gadgets that somehow just make sense. The vibe? No buyer's remorse, just smart, satisfying finds. Each TikTok is a curated peek into products that blend form, function, and a whole lot of 'why didn't I get this sooner?' Whether it's the perfect milk frother, motion-sensor lights, or a genius cleaning hack, these are the items that earn a permanent place in your space and your heart. Welcome to the Zero Regret Amazon Era where every buy feels like a tiny life upgrade.

name: How fast I can say bacon avocado
trend_description: This TikTok trend starts off as a tongue-twister challenge with creators asking, 'How fast can I say bacon avocado?' but just when you think it's a speed test, they glitch into slow motion, delivering the phrase (or a completely unexpected one) with exaggerated drama.

name: Olly Body Care
trend_description: TikTok is glowing (literally) with excitement over the newly launched Olly Body + Skin line a beauty-meets-wellness drop that's turning everyday routines into full-on rituals. Known for their cult-favorite gummies, Olly is now stepping into the self-care spotlight with body lotions, scrubs, and skincare essentials designed to nourish you head to toe. Creators are unboxing, testing, and raving about the textures, scents, and instant glow-up vibes all while filming dreamy bathroom routines and aesthetic 'get unready with me' content. From dewy hydration to body-loving ingredients, Body + Skin by Olly is becoming the new must-have for your top-shelf and top-drawer. It's self-care that smells good, feels good, and looks even better on your FYP.

name: Yellowface
trend_description: TikTok's literary side is buzzing over the sharp, twisty, and deeply provocative novel Yellowface by R.F. Kuang. This trend dives into readers' raw reactions, hot takes, and quote-filled reviews as they unpack the book's bold commentary on race, authorship, cultural appropriation, and the dark side of the publishing industry. Creators are calling it 'uncomfortably brilliant,' 'a masterclass in satire,' and 'the book that made me question everything' and it's easy to see why. With morally grey characters, industry drama, and a plot that feels too real, TikTokers are making aesthetic edits, recording stunned post-read thoughts, and even debating who's really the villain. It's messy. It's meta. It's a must-read. And in true TikTok fashion, Yellowface has become more than a book it's a conversation.

name: Capri Comeback
trend_description: The early 2000s called and TikTok is picking up with a full-on revival of capris fashion. Once a controversial closet staple, capris are making a bold and nostalgic return, styled with everything from ballet flats and chunky sneakers to sleek blazers and baby tees. This trend is all about reclaiming the cropped pant with confidence. Creators are turning side-eyes into style inspo, proving that capris aren't just back they're thriving. Whether it's coastal casual or Y2K chic, TikTok is serving capri slays in every aesthetic imaginable.

name: SONIC x Grillo's Pickle Menu
trend_description: TikTok is in full pickle panic mode over the unexpected and absolutely iconic Grillo's x Sonic collab. This trend features creators trying out the new pickle-packed menu items, from crunchy fried creations to zesty pickle slushes, all while giving their spicy, sour, and very enthusiastic reviews. It's the perfect blend of bold flavor and viral curiosity whether you're a certified pickle lover or just here for the hype. With dramatic first bites, pickle-themed unboxings, and reactions that range from 'life-changing' to 'weirdly addictive,' TikTok is turning this collab into the unexpected foodie moment of the summer.

name: Aura Racing Dance-Off
trend_description: This viral POV trend hilariously imagines the moment you get thrown into a dance circle, only to realize you've accidentally been training by watching endless clips of Indonesian boat aura racing and now, your every move perfectly matches the boaters' synchronized, trance-like motions. With wide stances, dramatic squats, and hypnotic arm waves, your dance style completely confuses (and impresses) everyone. The best part? You look possessed by the aura.

name: Manchild Dance
trend_description: Sabrina Carpenter has done it again and this time, it's not just her vocals breaking the internet, it's her now-iconic 'Manchild' dance that's taking over TikTok. With sassy steps, sharp arm moves, and that signature I-know-I'm-that-girl energy, creators are jumping on the trend to recreate the choreography with their own flair. Whether you're channeling heartbreak, confidence, or just living for the drama, this dance has become the ultimate mood booster and performance moment. Set to the infectious beat of 'Manchild,' it's bold, playful, and full of the classic Sabrina sparkle.

name: Color e.l.f.nalysis
trend_description: TikTok is blushing over e.l.f. Cosmetics' new color analysis tool, and creators are diving into this personalized beauty experience that tells you exactly which shades suit you best. With just a few clicks (or a selfie), the tool breaks down your undertones and delivers curated product recs from lipsticks to blushes perfectly matched to your unique color story.

name: Overruled
trend_description: BookTok is guilty of falling hard for Overruled, the sizzling legal romance that's turning courtroom drama into full-blown emotional chaos. This trend has readers posting their late-night reading spirals, jaw-drop moments, and quote reactions as they get swept up in a story of power, passion, and second chances all wrapped in legal briefs and undeniable tension. From morally gray leads to tension-filled trials and emotional whiplash, creators are calling it the perfect blend of law and lust. Aesthetic edits, annotated pages, and 'I was not ready' reactions are flooding the FYP as readers declare this one a must-read verdict.

name: Yes You Can
trend_description: This cheeky TikTok trend is all about calling out unspoken rules, social norms, or personal doubts and immediately shutting them down with a confident (and often hilarious) lip-sync to the audio: 'Yes you can.' Creators kick off their videos by writing a bold or questionable statement on screen like 'You can't trauma dump on your best friend at 2am' or 'You can't wear glitter to a job interview'. Then, in perfect comedic timing, they cut to a stone-faced or sassy delivery of 'Yes you can', flipping the expectation and owning the moment.

name: Something to take the edge off
trend_description: This viral TikTok trend flips the idea of a 'vice' on its head literally. It starts with a dramatic close-up of your fingers pinched like you're holding a cigarette, paired with the text: 'Something to take the edge off.' But when the camera pans out, the big reveal is not nicotine it's your real, often hilariously relatable, coping mechanism.

name: Rhode Lemontini
trend_description: TikTok is buzzing with citrusy excitement over Rhode's newest flavor drop: Lemontini a refreshing, limited-edition take on their cult-favorite peptide lip treatment. With its sleek yellow packaging and tangy-sweet scent, this launch is bringing summer-in-a-tube energy to every beauty girlie's top shelf. Creators are unboxing the lip treatment, swatching its glossy texture, and filming soft glam looks around the vibe of the Lemontini aesthetic: think yellow tones, sunshine lighting, and lemon emojis galore. Whether it's part of a 'hot girl summer routine' or a fresh addition to a Rhode collection, this trend is all about celebrating skincare that feels like a cocktail and looks like a glow-up.

name: You Look Happier Booktok Version
trend_description: This cozy and heartwarming BookTok trend pairs perfectly with the soft audio 'You look happier' and for good reason: it captures that exact moment when a book lover is completely swept away by a story they love. Creators are using the sound to spotlight their current reads whether it's a comfort re-read, a new obsession, or a book that just feels like home. The video often starts with a calm or neutral expression, and as the camera cuts to them holding or reading the book, a genuine smile blooms proving the point: this is what joy looks like.

name: Cool Lime Refresher
trend_description: Starbucks just brought the iconic Cool Lime Refresher back into the spotlight and TikTok is sipping with excitement. This trend captures creators racing to their nearest Starbucks, filming aesthetic drive-thru runs, first sips, and refreshing reactions as they celebrate the revival of a fan-favorite flavor. With its crisp, citrusy tang and instantly chill vibes, the Cool Lime Refresher is quickly becoming the drink of the summer (again). Whether you're pairing it with a sunny day fit, a book on a park bench, or your post-workout glow, TikTokers are making it the go-to beverage for peak refreshment energy. Cold. Crisp. Comeback Queen. The Cool Lime era is officially here.

name: Polka Dots Summer
trend_description: The polka dot print is making a playful, vintage-chic comeback and TikTok fashionistas are fully embracing the Polka Dot Summer trend. From breezy dresses to retro swimwear, dainty blouses to bold maxi skirts, this timeless print is proving it never really goes out of style it just needed a warm-weather glow-up. Creators are styling dots in soft pastels, classic black-and-white, and bold brights giving major old Hollywood meets coastal granddaughter energy. Whether it's a romantic picnic fit or a Euro summer look, polka dots are the new power print of the season, adding charm, movement, and a little whimsy to every outfit.

name: Homebody Life
trend_description: This wholesome and calming lifestyle trend is a love letter to the homebody life where soft blankets, slow mornings, and quiet joy reign supreme. Creators are showcasing their ideal stay-in days: journaling by the window, making matcha in a cozy kitchen, lighting their favorite candle, and vibing in their safe, personal sanctuary. It's not about FOMO it's about choosing comfort, peace, and intention. Whether it's reading in bed, organizing a bookshelf, or romanticizing your evening routine, this trend embraces the magic of being exactly where you are. Because sometimes, the best nights out are nights in.

name: Pulled up in a Bugatti
trend_description: This chaotic, high-energy TikTok trend is all about dramatic entrances set to the iconic line 'I woke up in a new Bugatti.' But instead of a luxury car reveal, the camera cuts to creators sitting on the floor or in a makeshift 'seat' position, arms gripping an invisible steering wheel before suddenly being yanked at full speed across the room. The exaggerated speed and deadpan expressions make it hilariously unhinged. Whether you're being pulled by a friend, a rope, or sheer commitment to the bit, it's the perfect blend of pop culture flex and TikTok absurdity.

name: Team Spider Lash
trend_description: This beauty TikTok trend is taking a stand and it's loud, proud, and spidery. While ""ghost lashes"" (the barely-there, featherlight lash trend) have had their soft, subtle moment, creators are now saying no to minimalism and yes to bold, clumpy, spiked-out spider lashes. The trend features creators applying thick coats of mascara or flaunting dramatic falsies with a wink of rebellion, often captioned with cheeky lines like ""We're not doing ghost lashes over here."" It's giving 2010s nostalgia with a high-fashion twist messy, moody, and unapologetically bold. Because sometimes, more is more and lashes that look like spider legs? That's the whole point.

name: Booktok Goes Red, White & Read
trend_description: This BookTok aesthetic trend celebrates the Fourth of July but with a literary twist. Creators are stacking, styling, and showcasing their red, white, and blue books to form the perfect patriotic palette, turning bookshelves into flag-inspired art. Whether it's a curated pile of hardcover spines, a rainbow reorganization moment, or a flat lay that screams star-spangled reader, this trend is all about mixing national pride with bookish personality. Bonus points for including American lit, summer romances, or fiery reads to match the vibes. It's festive. It's aesthetic. It's how BookTok does Independence Day one color-coded stack at a time.

name: Buy or Bye?
trend_description: In this fashion-forward TikTok trend, creators are putting their wardrobes on trial with one simple question: 'Bye or Buy?' The trend features rapid-fire outfit try-ons, impulse buys, or long-forgotten pieces pulled from the back of the closet all judged by their current vibe check. With a mix of personal opinions, audience polls, and brutally honest styling commentary, creators are deciding whether each piece is a fashion staple worth keeping (Buy) or a style slip headed to the donation pile (Bye). It's part closet cleanse, part fashion show, and 100% relatable.

name: McDonald's Blueberry Crme Pie Craze
trend_description: McDonald's has dropped a new berry-sweet obsession the Blueberry Crme Pie and TikTok foodies are racing to the drive-thru for a taste. With its golden flaky crust, rich blueberry filling, and smooth vanilla crme center, this limited-time dessert is becoming the ultimate indulgent bite of the season. The trend features aesthetic unboxings, slow-motion pie pulls, honest first-bite reactions, and dramatic 'I need 5 more' reviews. Whether you're a sweet tooth loyalist or just in it for the hype, this pie is making its mark as a must-try. Because nothing says comfort like warm, gooey, berry-filled goodness straight from the McDonald's dessert menu.

name: Morning in my Life
trend_description: This calming lifestyle trend is all about capturing the slow, intentional magic of a 'Morning in My Life.' From the first stretch under cozy blankets to making matcha, journaling by the window, or watering plants in soft sunlight creators are turning their everyday mornings into soothing aesthetic mini-films. Set to gentle music and filled with warm, quiet visuals, this trend celebrates the beauty in simplicity. It's less about productivity and more about presence showing how peaceful, mindful mornings can set the tone for the whole day. Because the best routines aren't rushed they're felt.

name: I Grieve Different
trend_description: This emotionally layered pop culture trend uses a powerful audio pivot to capture the moment when joy gives way to deeper introspection. The video begins lighthearted you're laughing, vibing, or seemingly having fun until the music abruptly shifts to Kendrick Lamar's haunting lyric: 'I grieve different.' That's when the real emotion hits: a vulnerable text overlay drops, revealing a hard truth, a repressed feeling, or a quiet realization you've been avoiding. The contrast between carefree visuals and emotional weight makes the trend resonate deeply, turning a TikTok into a micro-confessional. It's raw, relatable, and strikingly human because sometimes, the shift from smiling to silence speaks volumes.

name: Top 5 Favorite Blushes
trend_description: In this rosy, beauty-lover-approved TikTok trend, creators are sharing their Top 5 favorite blushes ranking or showcasing the formulas that give them that perfect pop of color. Whether it's dewy creams, silky powders, or viral liquid tints, this trend is all about celebrating the holy grail cheek products that never miss. Each pick is revealed with swatches, on-the-skin demos, or aesthetic flat-lays sometimes even color-coded or matched to different moods, seasons, or makeup looks. Beauty creators are weighing in with personal faves and hot takes, turning it into a blush-off where followers discover new must-haves for their own makeup bags. Because if you're going to blush might as well do it with the best.

name: Baggy Shorts Season
trend_description: Baggy shorts are officially taking over the fashion side of TikTok, and this trend is all about celebrating the cool-meets-comfort aesthetic. Whether they're styled with crop tops, oversized blazers, vintage tees, or sneakers, creators are showing how loose-fitting, longline shorts can be effortlessly elevated. From off-duty model looks to sporty streetwear to laid-back Euro summer, this trend proves that baggy = bold. It's the answer to too-tight summer fits, offering movement, airflow, and a whole lot of attitude all while looking effortlessly chic. Because sometimes, the most relaxed pieces make the loudest statement.

name: McDonald's Spicy McMuffin
trend_description: TikTok foodies are waking up with a kick of heat thanks to the new Spicy McMuffin from McDonald's and it's quickly becoming the breakfast order of the moment. This trend features creators unwrapping the sandwich in real time, taking that first fiery bite, and reacting to the unexpected spice that levels up the classic McMuffin. From honest reviews to side-by-side comparisons with the original, the content is packed with spice scale ratings, drool-worthy close-ups, and 'this goes harder than it should' reactions. Whether you're a spice lover or just here for the hype, one thing's clear: breakfast just got bold. Because mornings are better when they come with flavor and a little fire.

name: Plot Girl Summer
trend_description: Plot Girl Summer is the BookTok version of Hot Girl Summer but instead of beach clubs and flings, it's packed with high-stakes drama, juicy twists, and fictional chaos. Creators are showing off their TBRs stacked with romance, thrillers, betrayals, morally gray characters, and unputdownable reads all perfect for a summer spent chasing plot over reality. Whether you're lounging poolside with a dark academia fantasy or devouring messy love triangles under the sun, this trend celebrates being the main character with a book in hand. Think: late-night binge reads, annotated pages, and captions like 'I chose books over boys again.' Because this summer, it's not about tan lines it's about plot lines.

name: I Love Stuffs
trend_description: In this delightfully chaotic home lifestyle trend, creators are embracing their inner maximalist by showing off their cozy, cluttered, and personality-packed spaces all set to the now-iconic audio: 'I love stuffs.' From books stacked on every surface to walls covered in art, trinket-filled shelves, color-coded collections, and plushies with no personal space, this trend is a loud-and-proud love letter to having a lot of things and loving every single one. It's not mess it's meaning. Whether it's organized chaos or intentional abundance, this trend is all about rejecting minimalism and saying: yes to more, yes to joy, yes to stuffs.

name: Back-to-Back POV
trend_description: This sweet and cinematic pop culture couples trend is all about capturing love from both sides literally. Couples stand back-to-back, each holding up their phone to record a selfie video. The twist? Each partner appears in the background of the other's frame, creating a mirrored moment of togetherness even while turned away. Whether it's shared giggles, surprise kisses, or just syncing up their spins, this trend has become a soft showcase of connection, timing, and subtle intimacy. Often paired with dreamy or nostalgic audio, the clips give ""we're in this together"" energy even from different angles. Because true love? It always shows up even when your back is turned.

name: June Reading Wrap-Up
trend_description: In this cozy and satisfying BookTok trend, readers are rounding up their June reads with aesthetic snapshots, honest reviews, and rapid-fire ratings. From swoon-worthy romances to jaw-dropping thrillers, creators are sharing everything they devoured over the month the highs, the heartbreaks, the DNF moments, and the unexpected 5-star gems. With stacks of books, annotated pages, and warm-toned visuals, the June Reading Wrap-Up is more than just a list it's a reflection of moods, memories, and the stories that shaped the start of summer. Bonus points for themed emojis, color-coded covers, or creative ranking systems (hello 'cried in public' tier). Because in BookTok, every month ends with a stack and a story.

name: Yeehaw Beauty by Essence
trend_description: Essence Cosmetics is bringing rodeo flair to the beauty scene with its limited-edition 'Yeehaw' collection, and TikTok's beauty community is fully saddling up. This trend features creators unboxing, swatching, and playing with the Western-inspired line complete with glittery highlights, bold blushes, sunset-tone shadows, and packaging straight from a cowgirl's dream. From cowprint compact shots to full Yeehaw glam transformations, the vibe is equal parts playful, glowy, and rodeo-chic. Whether you're going full 'country concert core' or just love themed makeup drops, this collection is sparking content that's both on-trend and boots-on-the-vanity level iconic. Because nothing says glow-up like bronzer, blush, and a little bit of yeehaw.

name: Snack Wrap Comeback
trend_description: After years of begging, tweeting, and full-on manifesting, the iconic McDonald's Snack Wrap is finally making its grand return and TikTok foodies are celebrating like it's a national holiday. This trend features creators heading straight to McDonald's, filming their first bite back, and reacting with pure joy (or tears of nostalgia) to the crispy chicken, shredded lettuce, melty cheese, and tangy sauce wrapped in a warm tortilla. Whether you're reliving your 2010s lunch break or discovering the wrap hype for the first time, the content is filled with cravings, cravings satisfied, and the kind of snack-based serotonin only a long-lost menu item can bring. Because sometimes, the hero arc we've been waiting for is wrapped in paper and handed through a drive-thru.

name: Toe Ring Summer
trend_description: This summer, fashion is getting extra flirty all the way down to your toes. The Toe Ring Summer trend is sweeping TikTok as creators show off their latest obsession: dainty, metallic toe rings paired with glossy pedicures, strappy sandals, and beach-ready fits. The trend is all about the details those tiny glimmers of gold or silver that add a playful, Y2K-meets-coastal-granddaughter vibe to every step. Whether you're on vacation or just running errands, toe rings are becoming the must-have summer accessory that says, 'I don't skip style even below the ankle.' Because hot girl summer starts from the ground up.

name: Recently at Home
trend_description: In this calming and aesthetically pleasing home lifestyle trend, creators share peaceful snippets of their everyday routines under the gentle, reflective text: ""Recently at Home."" Whether it's brewing a slow morning coffee, folding fresh laundry, watering plants, or rearranging a cozy corner this trend romanticizes the quiet, intentional moments that make a house feel like home. Often paired with lo-fi music, warm lighting, and neutral-toned visuals, it captures the charm of being grounded and present, turning the ordinary into something almost cinematic. Because sometimes, the most beautiful stories happen right where you are.

name: My Makeup Type
trend_description: In this fun and spontaneous beauty trend, creators head to TikTok's search bar, type in 'my makeup type,' and let the algorithm do the rest. Whatever video shows up first whether it's 'soft glam,' 'clean girl,' 'grunge fairy,' or 'latte makeup' becomes the inspo for their next full face. It's the ultimate beauty blind pick, where the results feel random but the transformations are always creative. This trend mixes personal expression with TikTok fate, giving makeup lovers a new way to experiment with styles they may have never chosen for themselves. Because sometimes, your next signature look is just a search bar away.

name: What's in my Beach Bag
trend_description: This sun-soaked pop culture trend gives viewers a peek into the ultimate summer accessory: the beach bag. Creators are spilling (aesthetic) contents all over TikTok from chic sunscreen and viral lip balms to oversized sunnies, trending beach reads, snacks, and stylish must-haves. Whether it's curated for a coastal cowgirl vibe, Euro summer fantasy, or hot girl sunscreen era, each bag tells a story. The trend isn't just about what you pack it's about how you summer. Viewers are loving the mix of functional and fashionable, discovering product recs and personal rituals that make beach days better. Because a beach day isn't complete without the perfect pack and a little personality inside.

name: Rose in Chains
trend_description: BookTok is spiraling over ""Rose in Chains"", the dark, addictive read that's captivating readers with its blend of forbidden romance, mystery, and haunting beauty. This trend features creators dramatically reacting to major plot twists, swooning over the morally gray love interest, and posting aesthetic edits that match the book's intense, gothic vibe. With tropes like enemies-to-lovers, captivity, secrets, and survival, it's become a must-read for fans of dark romantasy and emotional rollercoasters. Readers are sharing their annotated pages, sobbing reviews, and 'this book owns me' captions because once you're in, there's no getting out. This isn't just a book it's a grip-you-by-the-soul kind of obsession.

name: Starbucks Strato Frappuccino
trend_description: Starbucks has just launched three new Strato Frappuccino flavors, and TikTok foodies are in full taste-test mode. This trend features creators hitting their nearest Starbucks to grab all three icy treats then ranking, reacting, and reviewing the creamy, dreamy new lineup. Whether you're team Berry Pink, Caramel Cloud, or Choco Mint Strato, the content is a blend of first impressions, whipped cream close-ups, aesthetic drink shots, and highly passionate opinions. Some are here for the vibes, others for the flavor... but everyone agrees: this is the sip of the season. Because nothing screams summer like a layered, limited-edition Frappuccino flight.

name: Aladdin Pants
trend_description: Aladdin pants also known as harem or genie pants are making a major fashion comeback on TikTok, and creators are fully embracing the flowy, free-spirited aesthetic. This trend highlights the effortlessly cool vibe of these wide-leg, drop-crotch trousers styled in modern, boho, or even streetwear looks. From barefoot beach fits to layered city outfits, fashion lovers are showing how comfort meets statement in these dramatic silhouettes. Think: maximal movement, minimal effort. Paired with crop tops, chunky accessories, or just the wind catching the fabric mid-twirl, Aladdin pants are now the main character energy of summer. Because fashion that feels like floating? Pure magic.

name: Amazon Prime Day Home Picks
trend_description: Amazon Prime Day has turned into a full-blown home lifestyle haul fest on TikTok and creators are sharing their best Prime Day home finds with aesthetic clips, satisfying unboxings, and game-changing upgrades. From viral kitchen gadgets and minimalist organizers to cozy lighting, smart home accessories, and TikTok-famous cleaning tools, this trend is all about elevating your space effortlessly and affordably. Each video feels like a mini home makeover, complete with before-and-after shots and 'how did I live without this?' reactions. Because when your home glows up with just a few clicks? That's Prime living.

name: Jinu Core
trend_description: This fierce and fantastical makeup & beauty trend is taking inspiration straight from the world of K-pop Demon Hunters, with creators transforming into the stylish and mysterious Jinu. Using bold eyeliner, sharp contouring, ethereal lenses, and dramatic K-idol flair, fans are channeling his supernatural aura with a full cosplay-meets-glam makeover. The trend is a love letter to character aesthetics meets beauty creativity, blending K-pop visuals with mythical warrior energy. Whether it's a full face beat or a subtle Jinu-inspired look, creators are serving demon-slaying drip with every swipe of shadow and gloss. Because in this trend, you're not just doing makeup you're stepping into legend.

name: The Irresistible Urge to Fall for Your Enemy
trend_description: The Irresistible Urge to Fall for Your Enemy by Brigitte Knightley is a fiery, slow-burn enemies-to-lovers romance that explores the razor-thin line between hate and desire. When two fiercely driven characters are forced to collide again and again tension simmers, tempers flare, and sparks fly. With sharp banter, undeniable chemistry, and emotional depth, this book delivers a deliciously dramatic love story that's as dangerous as it is irresistible. Perfect for fans of morally gray leads, lingering stares, and romance that aches before it heals.

name: Who Said That
trend_description: This hilarious pop culture trend plays out like a perfectly timed punchline. Creators start by making a bold, dramatic, or slightly chaotic statement from unpopular opinions to oversharing moments only to instantly follow it up with the now-iconic, suspiciously innocent line: ""Who said that?"" Whether it's used for exposing toxic traits, thirsting over a fictional character, or admitting something no one asked for, the trend thrives on comedic timing and mock denial. Bonus points for side-eyes, quick camera pans, or background friends calling you out mid-video. Because if you say something wild, just remember deny, deny, deny.

name: Avery's Black Rock Blend
trend_description: TikTok's food and beverage scene is buzzing over the newest sip-worthy collab: Avery Wood x Black Rock Coffee. This trend has creators rushing to their nearest Black Rock to try Avery's signature drink, showing off the aesthetic cup, their first reactions, and why it might just be their new favorite order. With sweet, creamy, and customizable vibes, the drink is becoming a go-to for fans of influencer-curated flavors. The content often includes iced drink close-ups, taste-test reviews, and of course, 'TikTok made me try it' energy. Because when a drink is this pretty and this hyped it's not just a collab, it's a beverage moment.

name: Fur Real Fashion
trend_description: Fashion TikTok is embracing all things soft, cozy, and extra with the rise of fur and faux-fur fashion. From fuzzy jackets and statement coats to fur-trimmed sleeves and Y2K-inspired accessories, creators are showing how a little texture can instantly elevate a look from simple to statement. This trend is all about tactile luxury and bold layering, often styled with sleek silhouettes or contrasted with streetwear for an editorial edge. Think winter runway meets cool-girl energy all with that irresistible plush finish. Because when fashion gets fuzzy, the style game gets fierce.

name: A Day in My Life as a [Your Age + Job]
trend_description: This lifestyle trend captures the everyday realities of early adulthood, with creators sharing 'A Day in My Life as a [insert age + role]' from 25-year-old post-grad students in NYC to 23-year-old first-jobbers navigating corporate life. Through cozy morning routines, subway commutes, office desk shots, study cafes, and nighttime wind-downs, these videos create a slice-of-life feel that blends routine with personal growth. The trend resonates for its relatability, aesthetic vibes, and comforting sense of 'you're not alone.' Because every age, every role, every routine it's all part of the story we're still writing.

name: Hour of the Pumpkin Queen
trend_description: BookTok is officially entering its spooky royal era with the release of Hour of the Pumpkin Queen, a hauntingly whimsical tale that's sweeping readers into a world of autumn magic, eerie elegance, and unexpected power. This trend features creators posting moody aesthetics, fall-inspired outfits, annotated quotes, and cozy dark-academia vibes all tied to the book's enchanting mix of gothic fantasy and seasonal flair. Whether it's the powerful heroine, the chilling setting, or the pumpkin-spiced plot twists, one thing's clear: readers are falling hard for the queen of the season. Because when the leaves fall, the Pumpkin Queen rises.

name: Rhode Girls Anthem
trend_description: Pop culture meets beauty obsession in this viral trend where girls flex their Rhode lip case while syncing to Justin Bieber's catchy new lyric: 'iPhone case, lip gloss on it.' The videos feature ultra-aesthetic shots of the signature Rhode phone case complete with the viral lip treatment attached giving major it-girl energy in the most casual, polished way. It's not just about the product; it's about the vibe the minimalist cool, the soft glam, the always-prepared look. This trend is a subtle power move that says: you're in the know, you're on the glow. Because in 2025, the hottest accessory? Is literally in your hand.

name: Sundae Cocktail Edition
trend_description: TikTok's beauty & lifestyle creators are saying cheers to self-care with the viral Sundae Cocktail Edition body washes a vibrant collection that turns your shower into a fruity, feel-good happy hour. Inspired by classic cocktails like Berry Daiquiri, Pineapple Margarita, and Peach Bellini, this trend showcases creators giving their daily routine a deliciously scented upgrade. From aesthetic shower caddy reveals to 'get ready with me' clips that feature the bottles' colorful pop, creators are raving about how these body washes don't just cleanse they set the mood. It's playful, indulgent, and totally TikTok-worthy. Because who says your happy hour can't happen in the shower?

name: Babydoll Dress
trend_description: Fashion TikTok is twirling back into the babydoll dress era, where soft silhouettes, puffed sleeves, and effortless charm are taking over summer wardrobes. This trend features creators styling their favorite babydoll dresses whether cottagecore-inspired, ultra-feminine, or paired with edgy accessories for contrast. With flowing fabrics, ruffled hems, and pastel palettes, the babydoll dress is being reimagined as the ultimate 'throw on and feel pretty' piece. It's giving vintage nostalgia, romantic escapism, and breezy confidence all at once. Because when comfort meets whimsy? That's a fashion fairytale.

name: M&S Strawberry Sandwich
trend_description: TikTok's foodies are in full love-it-or-hate-it mode over the viral M&S Strawberry Sandwich a sweet twist that's turning heads and taste buds. This unexpected combo of juicy strawberries, whipped cream, and soft bread has become the center of a delicious debate: is it a dessert, a snack, or pure food chaos? The trend shows creators giving their first bites, filming dramatic reactions, recreating the sandwich at home, or even remixing the concept with other fruits. Whether you're here for the novelty or the nostalgia of Japanese fruit sando vibes, one thing's for sure no one saw this going viral, but here we are. Because sometimes, TikTok just loves a food curveball especially when it's berry sweet.

name: Artistry Canvas Palette
trend_description: Beauty TikTok is having a full-on painter's renaissance with the rise of the Artistry Canvas Palette, a luxurious collection of highly pigmented shades that's turning everyday makeup into wearable artwork. This trend features creators showcasing seamless blends, dimensional color stories, and soft-to-bold transitions, all created with this now-viral palette. From dewy natural looks to full-glam editorials, the Artistry Canvas Palette is being praised for its buttery textures, blendability, and pro-level color payoff. TikTokers are calling it their 'new holy grail' with each look proving that a great face beat starts with the perfect palette. Because when your face is the canvas, Artistry brings the masterpiece.

name: Body Party meets Nani
trend_description: A cross-cultural remix is lighting up TikTok dance feeds combining Ciara's sultry 'Body Party' with the bubbly energy of 'Nani ga Suki?' in a sound that's both smooth and chaotic in the best way. Creators are hopping on the trend with fluid hip rolls, crisp footwork, and expressive hand moves, perfectly matching the unexpected switch-ups in the audio. The vibe? Equal parts R&B sensual and anime-core playful and somehow it works flawlessly. Whether you're in it for the groove, the attitude, or the aesthetic, this trend proves one thing: when two worlds collide, TikTok makes it dance.

name: It's a love story
trend_description: BookTok's soft girl era is in full bloom with the release of It's a Love Story by Annabel Monaghan a swoony, witty rom-com that's melting hearts and filling feeds. The trend features creators showing off their annotated pages, pastel tabs, dreamy moodboards, and cozy reading corners as they fall for the book's heartfelt characters and slow-burn magic. Whether you're a long-time fan of Monaghan or discovering her for the first time, this book is hitting all the right notes relatable romance, charming banter, and just enough ache to keep you hooked. Because sometimes, the best kind of love story is the one you read with a smile on your face and a blush on your cheeks.

name: KFC Fried Pickles
trend_description: TikTok foodies and beauty girls alike are uniting over one unexpected craving: the new KFC Fried Pickles. This tangy-meets-crispy snack is going viral for its golden crunch, bold flavor, and seriously snackable vibes and creators are showing their love with first-bite reactions, pickle hauls, and ASMR-worthy crunch tests.
