Whether you bleed blue or pinstripes, the energy is undeniable this isn't just a game; it's a moment every sports fan is living for.

name: Spookin' Sweet: Krispy Kreme Halloween Donuts
trend_description: Halloween just got a 'hole' lot sweeter! The Spookin' Sweet trend is taking over FoodTok as creators unwrap Krispy Kreme's limited-edition Halloween donut lineup think ghost-shaped glazes, monster faces, and pumpkin-inspired treats. TikTokers are filming taste tests, spooky unboxings, and 'which one are you?' donut personality quizzes, all under flickering orange lights and eerie music. It's playful, sugary, and perfectly in season a haunted house meets a sugar rush, one bite at a time.

name: Tears to Temptation
trend_description: TikTok's in its glow-up era with the Tears to Temptation trend a stunning transition moment set to 'Tears' by Sabrina Carpenter. Users start off bare-faced or casually undone, staring into the camera as the soft intro plays. But the second the beat drops, they flip the switch makeup flawless, hair done, outfits bold, and confidence radiating. It's not just a transformation; it's a statement from raw to radiant, plain to powerful, ordinary to oh wow. Sabrina's song becomes the soundtrack of self-reinvention, one drop at a time.

name: Seeing if I Have Talent so I can Quit
trend_description: The 'Quit My Job If I Can Sing' trend is taking over TikTok with a hilarious mix of hope and heartbreak. Users film themselves singing Sam Smith's 'Stay With Me' completely a cappella, paired with the on-screen text: 'Seeing if I have talent so I can quit.' The clips start off sincere soft eyes, deep breath, real emotion but whether the notes soar or stumble, the vibe always lands: painfully relatable and funny. It's a perfect blend of delusion, self-belief, and main character energy that only TikTok could turn into an anthem.

name: Stop Talking Dirty to Me
trend_description: The 'Stop Talking Dirty to Me' trend is taking over TikTok with peak Swiftie energy users post a text about something they absolutely love ('let's go to Target?', 'can we get tacos?', 'wanna rewatch Twilight?'), and just as the idea hits, they lip-sync to Taylor Swift's lyric, 'Stop talking dirty to me.' It's playful, flirty, and oh-so-relatable turning everyday obsessions into inside jokes with Taylor's iconic sass as the soundtrack.

name: Street Swinging
trend_description: The 'Hanging Vibes Only' trend swings through TikTok with creators literally hanging not leaning from street signs, lip-syncing to Kid Cudi's 'Maui Wowie.' Like a mix between playground nostalgia and downtown cool, users dangle midair, mouthing the lyrics with chill confidence as if the streets were their stage. It's bold, carefree, and effortlessly cinematic a moment that turns a simple street sign into the ultimate symbol of cool kid energy.

name: The Art of Patrick Ta
trend_description: The 'Art of Patrick Ta' trend is taking over BeautyTok as creators showcase the Patrick Ta Major Dimension Essential Artistry Eyeshadow Palette. With its sleek packaging and stunning mix of warm and cool neutrals, users are creating ultra-blended, editorial-worthy eye looks that scream effortless sophistication. Each video feels like a masterclass swatches, close-ups, and smooth transitions capturing the palette's luxe pigment payoff. It's not just makeup; it's makeup artistry elevated.

name: Pumpkin Spice Meets Matcha
trend_description: The 'Pumpkin Spice Meets Matcha Magic' trend is brewing all over FoodTok as creators whip up the viral pumpkin spice matcha drink a cozy-meets-fresh fusion that's stealing the spotlight this fall. The videos feature creamy green layers blending with warm pumpkin tones, often topped with cinnamon swirls or whipped cream. It's the perfect autumn aesthetic in a cup earthy, sweet, and TikTok-perfect combining two cult favorites into one irresistibly sippable moment.

name: Return of Missoni Print
trend_description: The 'Missoni Mode Revival' trend is weaving its way back into FashionTok, celebrating the iconic zigzag prints and kaleidoscopic knits that defined Missoni's legacy. Creators are styling vintage pieces or Missoni-inspired looks think bold color gradients, crochet textures, and effortless boho glamour proving that maximalist chic is back in rotation. This trend embodies the comeback of Italian flair meets modern cool, as fashion lovers embrace the nostalgia of 2000s runway energy with a 2025 twist.

name: Last-Minute Neves Magic
trend_description: Sportstok is alight with clips and reactions after Rben Neves delivered a stoppage-time, match-winning header for Portugal, snatching a 1-0 victory against the Republic of Ireland in a dramatic finish. Videos replay the buildup, the cross, and Neves's leap as fans erupt into cheers the moment became an instant icon of clutch football. The trend mixes slow-mo nostalgia, national pride, and 'did you see that?!' energy into one viral goal highlight. https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSUfSDkh7/ p

name: Pumpkin Square Season
trend_description: The 'Pumpkin Square Season' trend has FoodTok drooling over Crumbl's latest fall lineup, headlined by the cozy, crave-worthy Pumpkin Square Cookie. TikTok users are filming their first bites, fall-themed unboxings, and aesthetic close-ups of the gooey pumpkin layers topped with rich frosting. It's not just a cookie drop it's a full-on autumn moodboard wrapped in cinnamon, spice, and that signature Crumbl pink box.

name: Slavic Stare Trend
trend_description: Our feed is full of beautiful TikTokkers staring into our hearts practicing their "Slavic Stare". While most are hoping for "love", some creators are teaching "how tos" and others align it to how they were raised, videos with friend groups and hoping to use it for discounts.

name: Human Backpack
trend_description: Pop culture TikTok can't get enough of this hilarious 'Human Backpack' moment. In this trend, users film themselves carrying a girl on their back like a literal backpack right as the audio plays the line, 'why are you wearing a girl's purse?' The playful setup, paired with the perfectly timed lyric, turns into a lighthearted display of couple or bestie humor. It's goofy, endearing, and exactly the kind of chaotic energy that defines TikTok's humor right now.

name: Wait No!
trend_description: Pop culture TikTok is living for this perfectly timed 'wait' moment. In this trend, users set up a situation like a storytime or calm moment with on-screen text explaining what's going on. But just as things seem normal, something unexpected happens, prompting them to lip-sync the word 'wait' before the screen suddenly flashes white or cuts to chaos. It's dramatic, funny, and cinematic all at once the kind of micro-moment that keeps viewers replaying to catch every detail of the twist.

name: Too Ghoul Too Soon
trend_description: TikTok's beauty community is already in spooky mode with the 'Too Ghoul Too Soon' trend a wave of creators showing off their Halloween makeup looks way ahead of October 31. From eerie glam to full-on SFX transformations, users are proving it's never too early to summon your inner ghoul. The early Halloween spirit is taking over 'get ready with me' feeds, with captions like 'I know it's still early but' as everyone leans into the ghostly glam szn before anyone else.

name: Filthy Feels & Festive Reads
trend_description: BookTok is decking the halls early with the release of 'Merry Christmas, You Filthy Animal' the new holiday romance everyone's cozying up with. Readers are sharing aesthetic clips of twinkling lights, hot cocoa, and book annotations as they gush over the story's mix of festive chaos and heart-melting moments. The trend captures that perfect 'rom-com Christmas movie in book form' vibe, with creators calling it the ultimate comfort read to kick off the holiday szn.

name: Olive Is the New Black
trend_description: FashionTok has crowned a new neutral and it's olive green. From trench coats to cargo skirts and oversized knits, creators are swapping their classic blacks for earthy olive tones that feel both timeless and elevated. The trend blends minimalism with a military edge, proving that this muted hue pairs with almost anything. It's the color of quiet luxury this season effortlessly cool, endlessly wearable, and officially fashion's new obsession.

name: The Most Haunted Dunkin in America
trend_description: TikTok is spiraling over the real-life AI-looking Dunkin' in Salem yes, the witch city itself. With its eerie-perfect orange glow, spooky signage, and picture-perfect symmetry, users can't believe it's not digitally rendered. The coffee stop looks straight out of a Halloween movie set, and creators are flocking there to film 'proof' it actually exists. As one user put it, 'Even my pumpkin spice latte looks scared.' This Dunkin' is officially the internet's haunted caffeine hub of the season.

name: Pizza Wars 2025
trend_description: Pizza Ways 2025 shows Pizzeria workers across the country and their creative ways they stretch and pull dough, usually to Rihanna's song "Umbrella". Brands are engaging, especially mainstays SlimJim and Pepsi, with others jumping in, such as ScrubDaddy.

name: Group 7
trend_description: Over the weekend, musician Sophia James created 7 videos as an experiment, saying "You are in Group X" and Group 7 exploded.

name: AshxLuis (Starbucks Drive Thru Romance)
trend_description: Users are fully invested in a budding romace between a Starbuck barista and a drive thru customer.

name: Cuffing Season
trend_description: Users are talking about Cuffing Season, a period, typically from late fall to late winter, when single people seek short-term, committed relationships to get through the colder months.

name: The Rise of the Advent Calendar
trend_description: TikTok is obsessed with the release of 2025 Advent Calendars.

name: Sephora Sale
trend_description: Influencers are posting about their picks for the Sephora Sale

name: #madebymitchell
trend_description: Users are going crazy for the makeup looks and products by UK make artist Mitchell Halliday.

name: Sharing Top 5 Food Content Creators
trend_description: Influencers are sharing their Top 5 Content Creators on TikTok to shine a light on the ones making a difference in the category.

name: French Girl Fashion
trend_description: Once again, eyes are turning to the streets of Paris to see what the It Girls are wearing this season.

name: SNAP Support
trend_description: With SNAP benefits set to expire on November 1st, creators are jumping in to support, from restaunts offering discounts, to creators teaching how to stretch a dollar with shopping at Aldi and Dollar Tree.

name: His Side of the Story - Kevin Federline
trend_description: Users are posting about Kevin Federline's new book, "You Thought You Knew"

trend_description: Fashion girls are laying lace and other dresses over pants

trend_description: Users are discussing the British Vogue article "Is Having a Boyfriend Embarrassing Now?".

name: I Know Ball
trend_description: Users post videoos about how people in their life don't think they know what they're talking about.

trend_description: People talking about decorating now for the holidays.

trend_description: Users are using Telephone by Lady gaga and Beyonce to showcase their busy lives.

name: Maybelline Serum Lipstick
trend_description: Maybelline's Serum lipstick just launched and users can't get enough.

trend_description: Users are posting 'me On my way!" followed by doing the opposite of something you previously asked advice about

trend_description: Favorite things associated with your brand

trend_description: Creators are showing how one animal print piece elevates an outfit for Fall/Winter 2025.

trend_description: Miss Universe candidates walk out aafter a Director Insukts Miss Mexico

trend_description: While it may be Turkey at Thanksgiving, McDonald's is serving chicken this month!

name: France Bans Shein After Sex Doll Controversy
trend_description: Shein has announced a total ban on sex dolls after France warned it would block the site if it ever sold childlike sex dolls again.

name: Influencer Experiement Exposes Churches for Ignoring Desperate Mother
trend_description: On TikTok Nikalie Monroe posted a 43-part video series pretending to be a desperate mother seeking baby formula and reaches out to churches and religious groups for help.

name: Heretic Parfum, "A Very Gorey Holiday'
trend_description: Heretic Parfums collaboration with The Edward Gorey Charitable Trust-Welcome to A Very Gorey Holiday, an enchanting realm of mischief and magic.

name: Don't Judge, It Can Be You One Day
trend_description: TikTokers are jumping on this trend to give their next hot take.

name: Callback to the 90's: Minimalist Style
trend_description: Women are showing their 90's callback minimalist style choices.

name: #cozyathome
trend_description: User are settling in for the cold winter months and showing how they are #cozyathome.

name: Sportcenter - GRWM
trend_description: SportsCenter's Gary Striewski and Randy Scott have created a whole new sportsCenter audience by posting their GRWM struggles with studio makeup and skincare. Commenters and Brands have jumped to help!

name: Last November Vs Now
trend_description: Users are posting showcase how far they've come this year.

name: On my way Trend
trend_description: The On My Way trend captures people "on their way" to do the thing they've talked about not doing.

name: Books That I Blame for My Standard in Men
trend_description: BookTok is listing the books that have influence their standards in men.

name: Rare Beauty X Beis
trend_description: TikTok is loving the collaboration cosmetic bag between Rare Beauty and Beis.

name: Savory Snack Plate
trend_description: TikTok Girls are jumping on this new savory plate for girl dinners this Fall.

name: The Rabbit Got Me
trend_description: Based on Alice in Wonderland, TikTok is posting moments of when their world turned upside down.

name: Say Goodbye to the Penny
trend_description: The Penny passed away on Wednesday in Philadelphia at the age of 232. According to the Treasury Department, the causes were irrelevance and high cost.

name: Good Luck Scott Kelly
trend_description: At a Jonas Brothers concert, a man was caught reviewing a resume for Scott Kelly. The Jonas Brothers, Brands and TikTok fame quickly followed.

name: The Housekeeping Olympics
trend_description: The most intensive competition in LasVegas - The Housekeeping Olympics - who are you rooting for?

name: Dear Algorithm
trend_description: TikTok is posting to the Algorithm, asking to be shown to the people they want to be in their community.

name: Warming Up for the Holidays
trend_description: TikTok is showing the many ways they are warming up for the holiday season.

name: I think my book is broken
trend_description: Booktokkers are disapointed when their hot book boyfriend doesn't come to life out of their books.

name: Everything my Husband and I have Stuck Up our Butts Prank Challenge
trend_description: In a #couplesprank, woman fool their husbands in to giving a list of items that they then label as something they've used inappropriately.

name: Transition Incoming
trend_description: TikTok'rs are showing a quick transition from messy to next phase with a hand clap.

name: 3-3-3 Book Challenge
trend_description: Readers are sharing 3 books in different ways that mean something to them.

name: Sometimes I Wish...
trend_description: TikTok is posting wistful reflections on things they sometimes wish for, using the intro to the Police's "Every Breath You Take".

name: Bath and Body Works - Holiday Pickle Body Spray
trend_description: TikTok has opinions on Bath & Bodyworks new Holiday scents, including Grandma's Fruitcake and Holiday Pickle Ornament

name: Quarter Zip Tok
trend_description: A new style wave on TikTok: Black men are trading in their classic tracksuits for quarter-zip sweaters.

name: GameStop "Trade Anything Day"
trend_description: GameStop is hosting a 'Trade Anything Day' on December 6, where guests can bring in almost anything in exchange for store credit

name: Kick The Lid Off a Pen Challenge
trend_description: TikTok's new challenge is roundhouse kicking a sharpie to see if you can take the lid off- psych! Actually being used as a promotional prank!

name: 'Horses in the Stable'
trend_description: The 'Horses in the Stable' TikTok trend features people dancing like horses to the song Cowgirl Trailride by S. Dott ft. Tonio Armani.

name: Me Starting A Vlog and Then Forgetting The Rest of the Day
trend_description: Creators are posting about starting a vlog entry, day in the life, and then forgetting to add to it that day.

name: It's 9am and the Social Media Team Needs Its Content
trend_description: You can hear them coming! The social media team is looking for their victims, we mean, content!

name: Dancing In Silence
